Title: Verify application architecture defined
Description: Verify that the application architecture is documented and defines clear security responsibilities
TestSteps: 1. Review architecture documentation; 2. Verify security requirements; 3. Check design patterns

Title: Verify security controls inventory
Description: Verify that security controls are documented and tracked
TestSteps: 1. Document all controls; 2. List implementation status; 3. Track testing

Title: Verify open source components tracked
Description: Verify open source components and their versions are tracked
TestSteps: 1. Run SBOM tools; 2. Verify dependency list; 3. Check for updates

Title: Verify unique passwords
Description: Verify that users can set unique passwords
TestSteps: 1. Test password creation; 2. Verify uniqueness rules; 3. Check entropy

Title: Verify password storage with salt
Description: Verify that passwords are hashed with salt
TestSteps: 1. Inspect password hashing; 2. Verify salt usage; 3. Check algorithm

Title: Verify authentication flow
Description: Verify that authentication mechanisms are properly implemented
TestSteps: 1. Test login flow; 2. Verify session handling; 3. Check for bypasses

Title: Verify session token generation
Description: Verify that session tokens are properly generated and tracked
TestSteps: 1. Capture session tokens; 2. Analyze token format; 3. Check randomness

Title: Verify session tokens invalidation
Description: Verify that session tokens are invalidated on logout
TestSteps: 1. Test logout flow; 2. Verify token invalidation; 3. Check re-access

Title: Verify session timeouts
Description: Verify that sessions timeout properly
TestSteps: 1. Monitor session duration; 2. Verify timeout enforcement; 3. Test re-authentication

Title: Verify access control definition
Description: Verify that access control requirements are defined
TestSteps: 1. Review AC requirements; 2. List roles and permissions; 3. Check documentation

Title: Verify role definitions
Description: Verify that roles and permissions are properly defined
TestSteps: 1. Map all roles; 2. List permissions per role; 3. Check for overlaps

Title: Verify input validation framework
Description: Verify that input validation framework is in place
TestSteps: 1. Identify input validation points; 2. Test validation rules; 3. Check coverage

Title: Verify XSS protection
Description: Verify that XSS protection is implemented
TestSteps: 1. Test XSS payloads; 2. Verify output encoding; 3. Check CSP

Title: Verify injection prevention
Description: Verify that injection attacks are prevented
TestSteps: 1. Test SQL injection; 2. Verify parameterized queries; 3. Check for command injection

Title: Verify cryptographic algorithm usage
Description: Verify that only strong cryptographic algorithms are used
TestSteps: 1. Identify crypto usage; 2. Check algorithm strength; 3. Verify key length

Title: Verify encryption in transit
Description: Verify that data in transit is encrypted with TLS
TestSteps: 1. Capture network traffic; 2. Verify TLS version; 3. Check certificate

Title: Verify secure key management
Description: Verify that cryptographic keys are securely managed
TestSteps: 1. Locate key storage; 2. Verify key rotation; 3. Check access control

Title: Verify error handling framework
Description: Verify that error handling is implemented consistently
TestSteps: 1. Trigger errors; 2. Review error messages; 3. Check information disclosure

Title: Verify logging of security events
Description: Verify that security events are logged
TestSteps: 1. Identify logging points; 2. Verify logging implementation; 3. Check audit trail

Title: Verify data protection policy
Description: Verify that data protection policies are defined
TestSteps: 1. Review data policies; 2. Verify classification; 3. Check handling rules

Title: Verify data retention policies
Description: Verify that data retention policies are defined and enforced
TestSteps: 1. Identify data types; 2. Verify retention rules; 3. Check deletion procedures

Title: Verify communications security
Description: Verify that all communications are secure
TestSteps: 1. Check all communication channels; 2. Verify encryption; 3. Test for tampering

Title: Verify malicious code prevention
Description: Verify that malicious code is prevented
TestSteps: 1. Code review; 2. Run SAST tools; 3. Check dependencies

Title: Verify business logic testing
Description: Verify that business logic is tested for abuse
TestSteps: 1. Map business flows; 2. Identify bypass paths; 3. Test edge cases

Title: Verify file upload restrictions
Description: Verify that file uploads are restricted properly
TestSteps: 1. Test file upload; 2. Verify restrictions; 3. Check storage

Title: Verify file serving security
Description: Verify that files are served securely
TestSteps: 1. Test file access; 2. Verify permissions; 3. Check execution

Title: Verify API security controls
Description: Verify that API security controls are in place
TestSteps: 1. Document API endpoints; 2. Test authentication; 3. Verify rate limiting

Title: Verify configuration security
Description: Verify that configuration is secure
TestSteps: 1. Review config files; 2. Check for hardcoded secrets; 3. Verify permissions

Title: Verify dependency security
Description: Verify that dependencies are secure
TestSteps: 1. Run dependency check; 2. Update vulnerable packages; 3. Verify integrity
